code: import React from'react';import{Modal,Table,Input,Button,Spin}from'antd';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const CustomerSelectModal=_ref=>{let{visible,onOk,onCancel,customers,loading,onSearch,filteredCustomers,selectCustomer}=_ref;const columns=[{title:'Tên khách hàng',dataIndex:'name',key:'name'},{title:'Số điện thoại',dataIndex:'phone',key:'phone'},{title:'Email',dataIndex:'email',key:'email'},{title:'Địa chỉ',dataIndex:'address',key:'address'},{title:'Hành động',key:'action',render:(_,record)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{type:"link",onClick:()=>selectCustomer(record),children:"Ch\u1ECDn"})}];return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Modal,{open:visible,title:"Ch\u1ECDn kh\xE1ch h\xE0ng",onCancel:onCancel,footer:null,width:700,destroyOnClose:true,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Spin,{spinning:loading,tip:"\u0110ang t\u1EA3i kh\xE1ch h\xE0ng...",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Input.Search,{placeholder:"T\xECm theo t\xEAn ho\u1EB7c s\u1ED1 \u0111i\u1EC7n tho\u1EA1i",onSearch:onSearch,style:{marginBottom:16}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Table,{rowKey:"id",columns:columns,dataSource:filteredCustomers,pagination:{pageSize:8}})]})});};export default CustomerSelectModal;
